document.full_text: in a roundabout theater company revival of the terence ratigan play, mr. langella will play a ruthless 1930s financier who seeks the help of his estranged son.
document.title: man for another season: frank langella returning to broadway in 'man and boy'
lines_and_colors: in a roundabout theater company revival of the terence ratigan play, mr. langella will play a ruthless 1930s financier who seeks the help of his estranged son.
